original: Saṅkhārakkhandho na anicco na saṅkhato na paṭiccasamuppanno na khayadhammo na vayadhammo na virāgadhammo na nirodhadhammo na vipariṇāmadhammoti?
nanu saṅkhārakkhandho anicco saṅkhato paṭiccasamuppanno khayadhammo vayadhammo virāgadhammo nirodhadhammo vipariṇāmadhammoti?
vipariṇāmadhammo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
“suññamidaṁ, bhikkhave, saṅkhārā attena vā attaniyena vā”ti.
